sentences.en: Frequently he was the worse for liquor, which made him surly.
sentences.cn: 他常常喝醉酒, 酒后脾气很坏.

sentences.en: Grandfather set them up in a liquor business.
sentences.cn: 爷爷资助他们经营酒业。

sentences.en: Have another one . You can hold your liquor.
He keeps away from liquor and tobacco.
He loosened up under the liquor.
sentences.cn: 他喝了酒无所顾忌地乱说起来.

sentences.en: I saw what the liquor was doing to her.
sentences.cn: 我发现烈酒对她伤害很大。

sentences.en: In 1979, Liquor Barn thrived as a discount merchandiser.
sentences.cn: 1979年，LiquorBarn烈酒折扣店的生意十分红火。

sentences.en: Men in liquor must be handled differently.
sentences.cn: 对酒醉的人必须用不同的对待方法.

sentences.en: Mr Adams can't carry his liquor as he used to, so tell them not to keep filling his glass.
sentences.cn: 亚当斯先生已不像过去那样酒量很大, 所以叫他们不要不断地给他倒酒.

sentences.en: Patterson went straight to the liquor cabinet and extracted a bottle of Scotch.
sentences.cn: 帕特森径直走到酒柜前，取出一瓶苏格兰威士忌。

sentences.en: She drinks wine and beer but no liquor.
sentences.cn: 她喝葡萄酒和啤酒，但不沾烈性酒。

sentences.en: The liquor began to show its effect.
The liquor is not strong enough.
The room was filled with cases of liquor.
sentences.cn: 房间里满是一箱箱的烈性酒。

sentences.en: They had liquor for the adults and sodas for the children.
sentences.cn: 他们为大人准备了酒，为小孩准备了汽水。

sentences.en: They were prosecuted for illicit liquor selling.
sentences.cn: 他们因私卖烈酒而被起诉.

words.tran_cn: 液体的；清澈的；明亮的；易变的

phrases.tran_cn: 白液（多数来源于造纸厂）

trans.tran_en: a strong alcoholic drink such as whisky
